text: Va Fir'avn ʙa ʙuzurgoni qavmaş guft: Biguzored maro, to Mūsoro ʙikuşam va ū Parvardigori xudro ʙa jorī talaʙad ci tavre, ki ū gumon mekunad, ki Parvardigoraş ūro ʙa sūi mo firistodaast va ūro az mo nigah medorad. Metarsam, ki Mūso dinatonro digargun kunad jo dar in sarzamini Misr fasode ʙarangezad
